import { useContext } from 'react' import { ThemeContext } from './contexts/theme' import Header from './components/Header/Header' import About from './components/About/About' import Projects from './components/Projects/Projects' import Experience from './components/Experience/Experience' import ScrollToTop from './components/ScrollToTop/ScrollToTop' import Contact from './components/Contact/Contact' import Footer from './components/Footer/Footer' import './App.css' import './Loader.scss' import FadeInSection from './Fade.tsx' import React from 'react'; const App = () => { const [{ themeName }] = useContext(ThemeContext) window.addEventListener ("load", () => { const loader =document.querySelector(".content") loader.classList.add("loader-hidden"); }) return (

loading

) } export default App
